evaluated in terms of a complex-number representation of the space. -/
theorem right_angle_rotation_map_complex (f : «expr ≃ₗᵢ[ ] » E (exprℝ) (exprℂ))
    (hf : orientation.map (fin 2) f.to_linear_equiv o = complex.orientation) (x : E) : f ((exprJ) x) = I * f x :=

  rw [← complex.right_angle_rotation, ← hf, o.right_angle_rotation_map]
  simp

theorem right_angle_rotation_map' {F : Type _} [inner_product_space (exprℝ) F] [fact (finrank (exprℝ) F = 2)]
    (φ : «expr ≃ₗᵢ[ ] » E (exprℝ) F) :
    (orientation.map (fin 2) φ.to_linear_equiv o).right_angle_rotation =

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprJ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem right_angle_rotation_map {F : Type _} [inner_product_space (exprℝ) F] [fact (finrank (exprℝ) F = 2)]
    (φ : «expr ≃ₗᵢ[ ] » E (exprℝ) F) (x : F) :
    (orientation.map (fin 2) φ.to_linear_equiv o).right_angle_rotation x = φ (o.right_angle_rotation (φ.symm x)) :=
  by
  apply ext_inner_right (exprℝ)
  intro y
  rw [inner_right_angle_rotation_left]
  trans inner.real ((exprJ) (φ.symm x)) (φ.symm y)
  · simp [o.area_form_map]
  trans inner.real (φ ((exprJ) (φ.symm x))) (φ (φ.symm y))
  · rw [φ.inner_map_map]
  · simp

theorem right_angle_rotation_aux₁_right_angle_rotation_aux₁ (x : E) :
    o.right_angle_rotation_aux₁ (o.right_angle_rotation_aux₁ x) = -x :=

    linear_isometry.inner_map_map o.right_angle_rotation_aux₂ y x

nonneg_inner_and_area_form_eq_zero_iff_s:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprJ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `inner.real -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprω -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem nonneg_inner_and_area_form_eq_zero_iff_same_ray (x y : E) :
    0 ≤ inner.real x y ∧ (exprω) x y = 0 ↔ same_ray (exprℝ) x y :=
  by
  by_cases hx : x = 0
  · simp [hx]
  constructor
  · let a : exprℝ := (o.basis_right_angle_rotation x hx).repr y 0
    let b : exprℝ := (o.basis_right_angle_rotation x hx).repr y 1
    suffices
      0 ≤ a * «expr‖ ‖» x ^ 2 ∧ b * «expr‖ ‖» x ^ 2 = 0 → same_ray (exprℝ) x («expr • » a x + «expr • » b ((exprJ) x))
      by
      -- TODO trace the `dsimp` lemmas in this block to make a single `simp only`
      rw [← (o.basis_right_angle_rotation x hx).sum_repr y]
      simp only [fin.sum_univ_succ, coe_basis_right_angle_rotation]
      dsimp
      simp only [o.area_form_apply_self, map_smul, map_add, map_zero, inner_smul_left, inner_smul_right, inner_add_left,
        inner_add_right, inner_zero_right, linear_map.add_apply, matrix.cons_val_one]
      dsimp
      simp only [o.area_form_right_angle_rotation_right, mul_zero, add_zero, zero_add, neg_zero,
        o.inner_right_angle_rotation_right, o.area_form_apply_self, real_inner_self_eq_norm_sq]
      exact this
    rintro ⟨ha, hb⟩
    have hx' : 0 < «expr‖ ‖» x := by simpa using hx
    have ha' : 0 ≤ a := nonneg_of_mul_nonneg_left ha (by positivity)
    have hb' : b = 0 := eq_zero_of_ne_zero_of_mul_right_eq_zero (pow_ne_zero 2 hx'.ne') hb
    simpa [hb'] using same_ray_nonneg_smul_right x ha'
  · intro h
    obtain ⟨r, hr, rfl⟩ := h.exists_nonneg_left hx
    simp only [inner_smul_right, real_inner_self_eq_norm_sq, linear_map.map_smulₛₗ, area_form_apply_self,
      algebra.id.smul_eq_mul, mul_zero, eq_self_iff_true, and_true_iff]
    positivity
#align nonneg_inner_and_area_form_eq_zero_iff_same_ray nonneg_inner_and_area_form_eq_zero_iff_same_ray

/-- `J` commutes with any positively-oriented isometric automorphism. -/
theorem linear_isometry_equiv_comp_right_angle_rotation' (φ : «expr ≃ₗᵢ[ ] » E (exprℝ) E)
    (hφ : 0 < (φ.to_linear_equiv : «expr →ₗ[ ] » E (exprℝ) E).det) :
    linear_isometry_equiv.trans (exprJ) φ = φ.trans (exprJ) :=
  linear_isometry_equiv.ext <| o.linear_isometry_equiv_comp_right_angle_rotation φ hφ
#align linear_isometry_equiv_comp_right_angle_rotation' linear_isometry_equiv_comp_right_angle_rotation'

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprJ -/
/-- `J` commutes with any positively-oriented isometric automorphism. -/
theorem linear_isometry_equiv_comp_right_angle_rotation (φ : «expr ≃ₗᵢ[ ] » E (exprℝ) E)
    (hφ : 0 < (φ.to_linear_equiv : «expr →ₗ[ ] » E (exprℝ) E).det) (x : E) : φ ((exprJ) x) = (exprJ) (φ x) :=
  by
  convert (o.right_angle_rotation_map φ (φ x)).symm
  · simp
  · symm
    rwa [← o.map_eq_iff_det_pos φ.to_linear_equiv] at hφ
    rw [fact.out (finrank (exprℝ) E = 2), fintype.card_fin]

kahler_ne_zero_iff:
theorem kahler_ne_zero_iff (x y : E) : o.kahler x y ≠ 0 ↔ x ≠ 0 ∧ y ≠ 0 :=
  by
  refine' ⟨_, fun h => o.kahler_ne_zero h.1 h.2⟩
  contrapose
  simp only [not_and_or, not_not, kahler_apply_apply, complex.real_smul]
  rintro (rfl | rfl) <;> simp
#align kahler_ne_zero_iff kahler_ne_zero_iff
kahler_ne_zero:
theorem kahler_ne_zero {x y : E} (hx : x ≠ 0) (hy : y ≠ 0) : o.kahler x y ≠ 0 :=
  by
  apply mt o.eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_kahler_eq_zero
  tauto
#align kahler_ne_zero kahler_ne_zero

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem kahler_mul (a x y : E) : o.kahler x a * o.kahler a y = «expr‖ ‖» a ^ 2 * o.kahler x y :=
  by
  trans (↑(«expr‖ ‖» a ^ 2) : exprℂ) * o.kahler x y
  · ext
    · simp only [o.kahler_apply_apply, complex.add_im, complex.add_re, complex.I_im, complex.I_re, complex.mul_im,
        complex.mul_re, complex.of_real_im, complex.of_real_re, complex.real_smul]
      rw [real_inner_comm a x, o.area_form_swap x a]
      linear_combination o.inner_mul_inner_add_area_form_mul_area_form a x y
    · simp only [o.kahler_apply_apply, complex.add_im, complex.add_re, complex.I_im, complex.I_re, complex.mul_im,
        complex.mul_re, complex.of_real_im, complex.of_real_re, complex.real_smul]
      rw [real_inner_comm a x, o.area_form_swap x a]
      linear_combination o.inner_mul_area_form_sub a x y
  · norm_cast
#align kahler_mul kahler_mul

@[simp]
theorem area_form_comp_right_angle_rotation (x y : E) : (exprω) ((exprJ) x) ((exprJ) y) = (exprω) x y := by simp

area_form_comp_linear_isometry_equiv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃ₗᵢ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- The area form is invariant under pullback by a positively-oriented isometric automorphism. -/
theorem area_form_comp_linear_isometry_equiv (φ : «expr ≃ₗᵢ[ ] » E (exprℝ) E)
    (hφ : 0 < (φ.to_linear_equiv : «expr →ₗ[ ] » E (exprℝ) E).det) (x y : E) :
    o.area_form (φ x) (φ y) = o.area_form x y :=
  by
  convert o.area_form_map φ (φ x) (φ y)
  · symm
    rwa [← o.map_eq_iff_det_pos φ.to_linear_equiv] at hφ
    rw [fact.out (finrank (exprℝ) E = 2), fintype.card_fin]
  · simp
  · simp
#align area_form_comp_linear_isometry_equiv area_form_comp_linear_isometry_equiv
area_form_apply_self:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr![ ,]» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr![ ,]» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprω -/
@[simp]
theorem area_form_apply_self (x : E) : (exprω) x x = 0 :=
  by
  rw [area_form_to_volume_form]
  refine'
    o.volume_form.map_eq_zero_of_eq
      («expr![ ,]» "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr![ ,]»") _
      (_ : (0 : fin 2) ≠ 1)
  · simp
  · norm_num
#align area_form_apply_self area_form_apply_self
area_form'_apply:
@[simp]
theorem area_form'_apply (x : E) : o.area_form' x = (o.area_form x).to_continuous_linear_map :=
  rfl
#align area_form'_apply area_form'_apply
area_form:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `star_ring_end -/
@[simp]
protected theorem area_form (w z : exprℂ) : complex.orientation.area_form w z = ((star_ring_end) w * z).im :=
  by
  let o := complex.orientation
  simp only [o.area_form_to_volume_form, o.volume_form_robust complex.orthonormal_basis_one_I rfl, basis.det_apply,
    matrix.det_fin_two, basis.to_matrix_apply, to_basis_orthonormal_basis_one_I, matrix.cons_val_zero,
    coe_basis_one_I_repr, matrix.cons_val_one, matrix.head_cons, mul_im, conj_re, conj_im]
  ring
#align area_form area_form
abs_kahler:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem abs_kahler (x y : E) : complex.abs (o.kahler x y) = «expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» y :=
  by
  rw [← sq_eq_sq, complex.sq_abs]
  · linear_combination o.norm_sq_kahler x y
  · positivity
  · positivity
#align abs_kahler abs_kahler
abs_area_form_of_orthogonal:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `inner.real -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprω -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem abs_area_form_of_orthogonal {x y : E} (h : inner.real x y = 0) : |(exprω) x y| = «expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» y :=
  by
  rw [o.area_form_to_volume_form, o.abs_volume_form_apply_of_pairwise_orthogonal]
  · simp [fin.prod_univ_succ]
  intro i j hij
  fin_cases i <;> fin_cases j
  · simpa
  · simpa using h
  · simpa [real_inner_comm] using h
  · simpa
#align abs_area_form_of_orthogonal abs_area_form_of_orthogonal
abs_area_form_le:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr![ ,]» -/

theorem abs_area_form_le (x y : E) : |(exprω) x y| ≤ «expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» y := by
  simpa [area_form_to_volume_form, fin.prod_univ_succ] using
    o.abs_volume_form_apply_le
      («expr![ ,]» "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr![ ,]»")
